query: I am in need of a 7-day travel plan for a group of 8 travelers. We plan to depart from Chicago and visit 3 cities in Idaho from March 25th to March 31st, 2022. We've set our new budget at $22,200. In regards to dining preferences, we have a keen interest in Italian and Chinese cuisines.
goal: Trip from Chicago to Idaho; start date: 2022-03-25; duration: 7 day(s); budget: $22200; people: 1; city count target: 3; preferences: Italian, Chinese; must cities: None; priority cities: None
